Cella <- full_join(C16,C17,by="sample_seq") %>% 
  select(sample_seq,everything(),-starts_with("specimen")) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = c(2:5),
               names_to = "element",
               values_to = "VPDB") %>% 
  separate(element, into=c("element","specimen")) %>% 
  mutate(specimen=if_else(specimen=="x","C16","C17"))

# Plots
## Basic data
```{r}
Cella %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(
    x=sample_seq,
    y=VPDB,
    col=element,
    linetype=specimen,
  )+
  geom_path()+
  geom_point()

```

## Dynamic Time Warping
```{r}

SeqC16_O <- Cella %>% 
  filter(element=="O") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = specimen,
              values_from = VPDB) %>% 
  pull(C16) %>% 
    na.omit()
  
SeqC17_O <- Cella %>% 
  filter(element=="O") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = specimen,
              values_from = VPDB) %>% 
  pull(C17) %>% 
  na.omit()

alignment <- dtw(SeqC16_O,SeqC17_O,
                 keep=TRUE,
                 step.pattern=symmetric2)
           
plot(alignment,
     type = "twoway",
     offset = 3)
```

#### Add new x-values

```{r}
Al_C16_O <- SeqC16_O %>% #[alignment$index1] %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  cbind(x=1:43) %>% 
  mutate(specimen="C16")
  
Al_C17_O <- SeqC17_O [alignment$index2] %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  cbind(x=alignment$index1) %>% 
    mutate(specimen="C17")

O_aligned <- rbind(Al_C16_O,Al_C17_O) %>% 
  group_by(x,specimen) %>%
  summarise(value=mean(value)) %>% #this unifies points that were given the same location
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(value=round(value+0.000001*row_number(),5)) %>% #this adds some error to data points that are similar but far away from each other and prevents them to be grouped as one in the grouping step below
  group_by(specimen,value) %>% # this unifies extra points that were added to fill gaps in the record
  summarise(x=mean(x))

O_aligned %>% 
  rename(O=value) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=x,
      y=O,
      linetype=specimen)+
  geom_line()

# rm(SeqC16,SeqC17,Al_C16,Al_C17,alignment)

```

#### Adding d13C values to check alignment
```{r}

Al_C16_C <- Cella %>% 
  filter(element=="C") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = specimen,
              values_from = VPDB) %>% 
  pull(C16) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  cbind(x=1:43) %>% 
  mutate(specimen="C16")
  
SeqC17_C <- Cella %>% 
  filter(element=="C") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = specimen,
              values_from = VPDB) %>% 
  pull(C17) %>% 
  na.omit()

Al_C17_C <- SeqC17_C [alignment$index2] %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  cbind(x=alignment$index1) %>% 
    mutate(specimen="C17")


C_aligned <- rbind(Al_C16_C,Al_C17_C) %>% 
  group_by(x,specimen) %>%
  summarise(value=mean(value)) %>% #this unifies points that were given the same location
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(value=round(value+0.000001*row_number(),5)) %>% #this adds some error to data points that are similar but far away from each other and prevents them to be grouped as one in the grouping step below
  group_by(specimen,value) %>% # this unifies extra points that were added to fill gaps in the record
  summarise(x=mean(x))

C_aligned %>% 
  rename(C=value,) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=x,
      y=C,
      linetype=specimen)+
  geom_line()


```

# Mg/Ca data
## C16
```{r}

C16Trace_df <- read_csv(here("data","C16Trace.csv"),col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  rename(y=X1,
         x=X2,
         z=X3,
         dist=X4,
         mg_ca=X5,
         st_dev=X6)

# OmapC16 <- O_aligned %>% 
#   arrange(x) %>% 
#   filter(specimen=="C16") %>% 
#   ggplot()+
#   aes(x=x,
#       y=-value)+
#   geom_path()

OmapC16 <- Cella %>% 
  filter(specimen=="C16",
         element=="O") %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x=sample_seq,
      y=-VPDB)+
  geom_path()

MgCamapC16 <- C16Trace_df %>%
  filter(dist<5.5) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = dist*0.8,
      y = mg_ca) +
  xlim(0,5)+
  geom_path()
  
MgCamapC16/OmapC16


```
